AI Description: py-pip is the official installer for Python packages from the Python Package Index (PyPI). It is used to install and manage software packages written in Python.
Core Features: 1. Install Python packages from PyPI. 2. Manage package dependencies. 3. Easily uninstall packages. 4. Search for packages on PyPI. 5. Upgrade outdated packages. 6. Create own packages for distribution.
Research Field: Computer & Information Sciences, Software Engineering, Systems, & Development
